name: angular-related-files
description: Quickly switch between related Angular component, service, and directive files

angular-related-files.showTabBarButton.description: Show the 'Show Related Angular Files' button in the editor title bar.

angular-related-files.ignore.description: A list of file patterns to ignore when searching for related files.

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && (resourceLangId == typescript || resourceLangId == html || resourceLangId == scss || resourceLangId == css || resourceLangId == less || resourceLangId == sass)

editor/title.when: (resourceLangId == typescript || resourceLangId == html || resourceLangId == scss || resourceLangId == css || resourceLangId == less || resourceLangId == sass) && config.angular-related-files.showTabBarButton

editor/title/context.when: resourceLangId == typescript || resourceLangId == html || resourceLangId == scss || resourceLangId == css || resourceLangId == less || resourceLangId == sass

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
